triple_c.title: UCSD Triple C
triple_c.subtitle: Chinese Computer Community, San Diego, CA
details: Lead a Scrum team to develop a sales point forecasting product for college markets that reduces unproduced waste and improve efficiencies of markets’ supply chain. (Dashboard-liked Web App).
Implement and optimize several time-series prediciting algorithms for predicting product sales.

gac.title: GAC Motor
gac.subtitle: GAC Research & Development Center, Sunnyvale, CA
details: Developed and optimized the prediction model for the health of electric cars’ battery using Sklearn.
Create time-series data visualization based on the vehicle’s sensor data that helped the team determine important features for modeling.
Worked on unsupervised-learning models for detecting anomalous driving behaviors.

hox.title: HΩX
hox.subtitle: Eta Omega Chi, Professional Fraternity, UCSD
details: Coordinate, plan and execute fraternity's activities
Build up HΩX's social media matrix such as TikTok, Youtube, etc.
Provide technical consultanting for brothers without technical background
